citeinfo.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 5 (1995) - Modelling of the Subarctic North Pacific Circulation (Report of Working Group 7) / edited by Paul H. Leblond and Masahiro Endoh

descript.abstract:
This review focuses on modeling ocean circulation and its variability in the subarctic North Pacific; it addresses issues specific to that region, and not the subject of ocean modeling in general. The performance of existing models is assessed in relation to observations in the upper ocean, intermediate waters and deep/abyssal waters.
[ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.5. ISBN 0969842058 ]
descript.purpose: To review the state of modeling efforts of the circulation of the subarctic Pacific.
